title: shrI subrahmaNya lOka
sahitya:
shrI subrahmaNya lOka sharaNyashrtajana kAruNya dEva varENya madanakOTi lAvaNya


anupallavi

  dAsAntaranga sArangadharanuta dAnava vara tArakAdya suraharaphalinIpuradEva vara


caraNam    sura sEvita caraNa vallI dEvasEnA ramaNa shrI sahita suguNa karadhrta mahAdaNDa vElAyudha
shuddha yuddha vIra parama shAnta svaprakAsha cidAnandarUpa varada sadAshiva kavi 
pApahara mAm pAhi shubham dEhi suracamUpatE gauravarNamUrtE
